list_translation_mean.translate_mean: xe hai bánh có bàn trẻ con
xe máy dầu có bánh nhỏ

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a light two-wheeled open motor vehicle on which the driver sits over an enclosed engine with legs together and feet resting on a floorboard.

a vehicle typically ridden as a recreation, consisting of a footboard mounted on two wheels and a long steering handle, propelled by resting one foot on the footboard and pushing the other against the ground.
travel or ride on a scooter.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: scootering is the most economical and practical form of transportation
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Sóng xe là hình thức vận chuyển kinh tế và thực tế nhất
